data.name: Retail Banking
data.description: Handles services for individual customers, like savings accounts, loans, and credit cards

data.name: Corporate Banking
data.description: Provides banking services to large corporations, including loans and treasury services

data.name: Investment Banking
data.description: Offers services like mergers, acquisitions, and raising capital for businesses

data.name: Personal Loans
data.description: Manages personal loan products and customer interactions

data.name: Credit Cards
data.description: Handles issuance and management of credit card services

data.name: Wealth Management
data.description: Provides high-net-worth individuals with wealth planning and investment services
